relationships.description: Snape and Karkaroff have a conversation, with Snape initially trying to brush off the discussion but eventually agreeing to talk.
Karkaroff confronts Snape about his avoidance of him, indicating a tense relationship between the two.
Snape is considering taking a leaf out of Moody's book and drinking from a private hip flask, suggesting that Moody has had an influence on Snape.
